### Government Tender Announcement
#### Job Hazard Analysis Including GBA+, Occupational H&S and Database Services

#### Reference Number: MX-43088024879 | Amendment Number: 3
#### Solicitation Number: PRO23SO3_80758 | Publication Date: 2024-04-09 | Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-29 14:00:00

#### Description:
The Department of National Defence, through Defence Construction Canada, is issuing a request for abbreviated proposals (RFAP) for job hazard analysis including GBA+, occupational health and safety, and database services for its Pacific Real Property Operations Unit.

#### Objective:
The selected consultant will provide environmental professional consulting services to support the Pacific Real Property Operations Unit and other Department of National Defence (DND) units within the Pacific Region. The services will include conducting job hazard analysis (JHA), GBA+ assessments, and providing database services for industrial hygiene and occupational health and safety.

#### Estimated Value:
The estimated value of the opportunity is in the range of $1,320,000.00.

#### Evaluation Criteria:
Information provided by the proponents will be evaluated using the established criteria in the RFAP.

#### Security Requirements:
The selected consultant will be required to hold a valid DESIGNATED ORGANIZATION SCREENING (DOS), issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

#### Contact Information:
Justin Bennett at justin.bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca | 819-962-2917

#### Notice URL:
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2851101915/abstract?language=EN (English) and https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2851101915/abstract?language=FR (French)

#### Submission Deadline:
May 29, 2024, at 14:00:00 | Bidding and documents available on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com)

**Please respond to this tender by submitting an offer through the Merx Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time indicated.**
